system.descriptionText: If Comrade is in Comms Range, until the start of the next turn, all enemies suffer -10 to WS Tests to hit the Character, and they can take one extra Dodge or Parry Action.

description.value: If Comrade is in Comms Range, until the start of the next turn, all enemies suffer -10 to WS Tests to hit the Character, and they can take one extra Dodge or Parry Action.
